Title: It's funny that people's evidential standard for tasting food being healthy is infinity higher than ...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: It's funny that people's evidential standard for tasting food being healthy is infinity higher than non tasty. Say one drink a day is healthy and people will say "correlation is not causation" as if they hold any "healthy food" to that standard. Say ice cream reduces diabetesâ€¦
